GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
ima: Fix a potential integer overflow in ima_appraise_measurement

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 640cea4c2839a821adfbb703b590a5928abe9286, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 39b07096364a42c516415d5f841069e885234e61. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ima: Fix a potential integer overflow in ima_appraise_measurement
